name: use-color-luminance
description: Hook to determine a colour's luminance
author: Derk-Jan Karrenbeld <derk-jan+github@karrenbeld.info>

scripts.build: yarn build:module && yarn build:main && yarn build:dts
scripts.build:module: yarn tsc --module es2015 --outDir build && move build\useColorLuminance.js .\index.es.js
scripts.build:main: yarn tsc --module commonjs --outDir build && move build\useColorLuminance.js .\index.cjs.js
scripts.build:dts: yarn tsc --declaration --declarationMap --emitDeclarationOnly && move useColorLuminance.d.ts index.d.ts && move useColorLuminance.d.ts.map index.d.ts.map
